short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display and read a random Quran verse when a new tab is opened.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Quran Verse - Inspiring Ayahs in Every Tab

Bring a moment of reflection into your daily browsing with Daily Quran Verse! Each time you open a new tab, youâ€™ll see a randomly selected ayah (verse) from the Quran, along with an audio option to hear the English translation. This extension is perfect for anyone looking to deepen their connection with the Quran in small, mindful moments throughout the day.

Features:

Random Ayah on Each Tab: Discover a new verse every time you open a tab.
Audio Option: Listen to the verse in English to reflect on its meaning.
Seek Through Verses: Use the First, Previous, and Next buttons to navigate through ayahs easily.
Let each tab become a source of inspiration and reflection. Whether you're new to the Quran or have been studying it for years, Daily Quran Verse helps make its wisdom a part of your daily life.

Download now and begin your journey of connection with the Quran, one verse at a time!
